channel.title: - Security Guard Theater video
channel.itunes:author: R C Raycraft
channel.description: Security Guard Theater video - The original caught on tape video podcast. Video cameras record your every move in public. Disturbing, often shocking and even funny clips are caught on video everyday. What happens to all these videos? Welcome to the "Caught on Tape" reality archive. See the raw uncensored videos which will never been seen on network televsion. From the creator of network and cable television series, "Shocking Police Video" and "Protect & Serve".
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Original online uncut uncensored "Caught on Tape" video reality archive Podcast.
channel.itunes:summary: Security Guard Theater video - The original caught on tape video podcast. Video cameras record your every move in public. Disturbing, often shocking and even funny clips are caught on video everyday. What happens to all these videos? Welcome to the "Caught on Tape" reality archive. See the raw uncensored videos which will never been seen on network televsion. From the creator of network and cable television series, "Shocking Police Video" and "Protect & Serve".

item.title: Episode 116
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: DONT STAND SO CLOSE TO ME - SHOCKING WORK PLACE INJURY
item.itunes:summary: Disturbing consequences of standing too close to a semi on the loading dock...After getting his log book signed, this trucker gets in and accidently runs over his boss.Apparently he didn't look in the rear view mirror, or maybe he did???
item.description: Disturbing consequences of standing too close to a semi on the loading dock...After getting his log book signed, this trucker gets in and accidently runs over his boss.Apparently he didn't look in the rear view mirror, or maybe he did???

item.title: Episode 105
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: INSTANT DRIVE THRU WINDOW
item.itunes:summary: In this freak accident a customer is run over by a pickup truck that smashes through a window into the middle of a bank lobby. See the whole clip at SecurityGuardTheater.com
item.description: In this freak accident a customer is run over by a pickup truck that smashes through a window into the middle of a bank lobby. See the whole clip at SecurityGuardTheater.com

item.title: Episode 101
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: OIL CHANGE OOPS!
item.itunes:summary: This is what happens when you ask your wife to have the oil changed on your car. Guess what happens next? See the whole clip at SecurityGuardTheater.com
item.description: This is what happens when you ask your wife to have the oil changed on your car. Guess what happens next? See the whole clip at SecurityGuardTheater.com

item.title: Episode 082
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: DRIVER'S ED TEACHER SHOWS HOW NOT TO DO IT
item.itunes:summary: In this clip a driver's ed teacher is hauling the dunk tank down to the football field. When the truck won't go forward, he gives it more gas thinking it is caught on the curb... it wasn't.
item.description: In this clip a driver's ed teacher is hauling the dunk tank down to the football field. When the truck won't go forward, he gives it more gas thinking it is caught on the curb... it wasn't.

item.title: Episode 071
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: IS IT REALLY WORTH IT OVER A CANDYBAR?
item.itunes:summary: This amazing clip begins with a female suspect who stole a candybar and is confronted by the store owner. When he tries to restrain her, her boyfriend enters. Guess what happens next? See the whole clip at SecurityGuardTheater.com
item.description: This amazing clip begins with a female suspect who stole a candybar and is confronted by the store owner. When he tries to restrain her, her boyfriend enters. Guess what happens next? See the whole clip at SecurityGuardTheater.com

item.title: Episode 060
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: BALLPARK BANANA TRICK
item.itunes:summary: PURE GENIUS. These guys brought their own entertainment to the ballpark... a stripper. They brought the dollar bills... she brought the banana. Join The Guard... see the long version at www.SecurityGuardTheater.com
item.description: PURE GENIUS. These guys brought their own entertainment to the ballpark... a stripper. They brought the dollar bills... she brought the banana. Join The Guard... see the long version at www.SecurityGuardTheater.com

item.title: Episode 058
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: MIDDLE FINGER DUI TEST
item.itunes:summary: When this DUI suspect can't do the test the officer requests, he makes up his own... the middle finger test. See the whole clip at SecurityGuardTheater.com
item.description: When this DUI suspect can't do the test the officer requests, he makes up his own... the middle finger test. See the whole clip at SecurityGuardTheater.com

item.title: Episode 051
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: MOVE OVER MEL GIBSON - DRUNK DUI BIGOT AWARD NOMINEE #2
item.itunes:summary: Mel Gibson has competition for the DBA... Drunken Bigot Award. This anti-Semite DUI suspect keeps it real, telling Officer Epstien and Officer Kumar the ways of the world... and to stick his license up their ass. Vote Now on SecurityGuardTheater.com
item.description: Mel Gibson has competition for the DBA... Drunken Bigot Award. This anti-Semite DUI suspect keeps it real, telling Officer Epstien and Officer Kumar the ways of the world... and to stick his license up their ass. Vote Now on SecurityGuardTheater.com

item.title: Episode 050
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: SWITCHBLADE FIGHT AT THE WORLD CUP
item.itunes:summary: This is why opposing fans are segregated during football matches.... switchblade fights, group attacks and a hungry K-9.
item.description: This is why opposing fans are segregated during football matches.... switchblade fights, group attacks and a hungry K-9.

item.title: Episode 049
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: PICKPOCKET STEALS BILLFOLD OUT OF PURSE
item.itunes:summary: Beware ladies.... when you're at the mall make sure this doesn't happen to you. These thieves were busted moments later.
item.description: Beware ladies.... when you're at the mall make sure this doesn't happen to you. These thieves were busted moments later.

item.title: Episode 45
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: NEVER DRINK COFFEE FROM THE BREAK ROOM
item.itunes:summary: After a series of petty thefts at a beauty parlor the owner puts in a hidden camera... and got the shock of her life. No wonder the coffee tastes like piss.
item.description: After a series of petty thefts at a beauty parlor the owner puts in a hidden camera... and got the shock of her life. No wonder the coffee tastes like piss.

item.title: Episode 40
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: CRACKHEAD HITS COP IN HEAD WITH CEMENT BLOCK
item.itunes:summary: With hidden cameras rolling this undercover officer tries to buy crack, a dealer recognizes him and tries to kill him.
item.description: With hidden cameras rolling this undercover officer tries to buy crack, a dealer recognizes him and tries to kill him.

item.title: Episode 39
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: BURGLARY BECOMES FEDERAL OFFENSE
item.itunes:summary: This dumbass breaks into a post office to steal change out of the stamp machine.... and ends up serving ten years in federal prison.
item.description: This dumbass breaks into a post office to steal change out of the stamp machine.... and ends up serving ten years in federal prison.

item.title: Episode 36
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: ROBBERS SMASH INTO STORE AND STEAL CASH MACHINE
item.itunes:summary: These bungling robbers use their own truck to steal a cash machine. The truck bumper gets ripped off during the heist, with the license plate still attached. Oops!
item.description: These bungling robbers use their own truck to steal a cash machine. The truck bumper gets ripped off during the heist, with the license plate still attached. Oops!

item.title: Episode 35
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: ARMED ROBBERY - KNIFE v/s MOP
item.itunes:summary: When an escaped mental patient tries to rob a gas station, the cashier escapes and finds the closest weapon... a mop!
item.description: When an escaped mental patient tries to rob a gas station, the cashier escapes and finds the closest weapon... a mop!

item.title: Episode 34
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: CASHIER v/s CUSTOMER
item.itunes:summary: This large female would come in everyday and steal a pack of cigarettes... one day the cashier had enough. Guess what happens next?
item.description: This large female would come in everyday and steal a pack of cigarettes... one day the cashier had enough. Guess what happens next?

item.title: Episode 33
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: PIMPIN' AIN'T EASY
item.itunes:summary: This pimp messed with the wrong honky, a police karate instructor returning from lunch.
item.description: This pimp messed with the wrong honky, a police karate instructor returning from lunch.

item.title: Episode 026
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: GANGSTA SHOPPING SPREE!
item.itunes:summary: When this group of thugs shows up everybody knows what happens next... a gangsta shopping spree.
item.description: When this group of thugs shows up everybody knows what happens next... a gangsta shopping spree.

item.title: Episode 024
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: Mall Security Bust Cheaters in Parking Lot
item.itunes:summary: Mall security cameras catch a store manager making out with an employee in the parking lot. Security Guards race to the scene.
item.description: Mall security cameras catch a store manager making out with an employee in the parking lot. Security Guards race to the scene.

item.title: Episode 021
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: WHAT NOT TO SAY TO A COP.
item.itunes:summary: This idiot uses the traffic cone as a megaphone... you'll never guess what he says when the cop asks him what he had for breakfast!
item.description: This idiot uses the traffic cone as a megaphone... you'll never guess what he says when the cop asks him what he had for breakfast!

item.title: Episode 020
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: PSYCHIC COP #2
item.itunes:summary: This is an amazing clip. Just before the officer is hit by a car he looks up... saving his life.
item.description: This is an amazing clip. Just before the officer is hit by a car he looks up... saving his life.

item.title: Episode 019
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: PSYCHIC COP SHOWS OFF
item.itunes:summary: PSYCHIC COP SHOWS OFF... Ever wonder why officers ask you to step away from your vehicle? Her mother-in-law was in the car.
item.description: PSYCHIC COP SHOWS OFF... Ever wonder why officers ask you to step away from your vehicle? Her mother-in-law was in the car.

item.title: Episode 018
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: POLICE OFFICERS DREAMS COME TRUE
item.itunes:summary: Two amateur strippers are pulled over while driving naked. Next they play in the sprinklers... is this enough for an arrest?
item.description: Two amateur strippers are pulled over while driving naked. Next they play in the sprinklers... is this enough for an arrest?

item.title: Episode 017
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: WHACK CRACK ATTACK
item.itunes:summary: This crack dealer hangs onto a speeding car for his life as a drug deal goes bad... or good? You decide.
item.description: This crack dealer hangs onto a speeding car for his life as a drug deal goes bad... or good? You decide.

item.title: Episode 016
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: BOYFRIEND v/s ExBOYFRIEND SHOOTOUT
item.itunes:summary: After a serious of problems on the front porch, a landlord installs a hidden camera. Little did he know the camera would record a shoot-out that very night.
item.description: After a serious of problems on the front porch, a landlord installs a hidden camera. Little did he know the camera would record a shoot-out that very night.

item.title: Episode 015
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: S&M DUDE GETS DUI?
item.itunes:summary: This is one of the strangest DUI stops we have ever seen. When the suspect gets out of the car he is wearing chaps, with a chrome cod-piece... Where does he keep his wallet?
item.description: This is one of the strangest DUI stops we have ever seen. When the suspect gets out of the car he is wearing chaps, with a chrome cod-piece... Where does he keep his wallet?

item.title: Episode 014
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: Security wall saves the day for clerk from would be robber. BONUS - Assailant gets knocked out cold!
item.itunes:summary: In the first clip, a robber tries to steal the cash and the clerk presses the security wall to block him in. In the second clip, the robber gets caught by the neck trying to reach for the register! Unbelievable freak accident caught on police video.
item.description: In the first clip, a robber tries to steal the cash and the clerk presses the security wall to block him in. In the second clip, the robber gets caught by the neck trying to reach for the register! Unbelievable freak accident caught on police video.

item.title: Episode 013
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: Armed robbers take some shots but in the end get the wrong tape.
item.itunes:summary: A robber comes in shooting and hits the clerk in the arm. Next he demands the customers steal all the money... it turns out they are in on the robbery. Guess what happens when they try and steal the video of the robbery?.... the real one was hidden in the back.
item.description: A robber comes in shooting and hits the clerk in the arm. Next he demands the customers steal all the money... it turns out they are in on the robbery. Guess what happens when they try and steal the video of the robbery?.... the real one was hidden in the back.

item.title: Episode 012
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: Armed assailant gets beat down with his own shotgun by tiny store owner.
item.itunes:summary: In this police video, a robber armed with a shotgun get jumped and the clerks beat the shit out of him with his own gun. The funniest part is after the robber gets his ass kicked HE presses the panic button too... See the uncut police videos the networks won't air. 50+ episodes only available online. item.title: Episode 010
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: Santa gets pulled over for DUI.
item.itunes:summary: Santa gets pulled over on Christmas Eve. Why is Santa driving his lawn mower on the highway? Is Christmas ruined this year for all the children?
item.description: Santa gets pulled over on Christmas Eve. Why is Santa driving his lawn mower on the highway? Is Christmas ruined this year for all the children?

item.title: Episode 009
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: Semi tip over / Assault with a deadly weapon / Girls getting DUI
item.itunes:summary: An officer's squad is hit by an eighteen-wheeler. Boyfriend vs. Ex-Boyfriend ends in a shooting.Two females are pulled over while driving naked. Next they play in the sprinklers... is this enough for an arrest?
item.description: An officer's squad is hit by an eighteen-wheeler. Boyfriend vs. Ex-Boyfriend ends in a shooting.Two females are pulled over while driving naked. Next they play in the sprinklers... is this enough for an arrest?

item.title: Episode 008
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: Video Vandals busted by MOM
item.itunes:summary: These young Einsteins decided to film themselves blowing up mailboxes. They get busted when a victim finds the their camera hidden under some leaves... with all the evidence caught on tape! Oops.
item.description: These young Einsteins decided to film themselves blowing up mailboxes. They get busted when a victim finds the their camera hidden under some leaves... with all the evidence caught on tape! Oops.

item.title: Episode 007
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: THE NUTCRACKER : COP KICKED IN NUTS
item.itunes:summary: This lady jumps out of her car, yells at the officer and them kicks him in the nuts three times before he picks her up and carries her to the squad car.
item.description: This lady jumps out of her car, yells at the officer and them kicks him in the nuts three times before he picks her up and carries her to the squad car.

item.title: Episode 006
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: ARMED ROBBERY - MISSED BY A HAIR
item.itunes:summary: These morons pull out a gun and shoot the cashier at point blank range... and miss. Her quick thinking keeps her alive. This is truly an amazing clip.
item.description: These morons pull out a gun and shoot the cashier at point blank range... and miss. Her quick thinking keeps her alive. This is truly an amazing clip.

item.title: Episode 005
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: SUSPECT LOOSES CLOTHES DURING ESCAPE
item.itunes:summary: This routine stop goes bad when the officer frisks the suspect and finds a weapon. As he tries to escape, the suspect looses his clothes and gains his freedom... for about five minutes.
item.description: This routine stop goes bad when the officer frisks the suspect and finds a weapon. As he tries to escape, the suspect looses his clothes and gains his freedom... for about five minutes.

item.title: Episode 004
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: OFFICER HIT ON HEAD W/PURSE: LICENSE SUSPENDED!
item.itunes:summary: This female suspect decides to go to jail the hard way. She knows the officer. He knows her license is suspended. This is why tazors are now standard issue.
item.description: This female suspect decides to go to jail the hard way. She knows the officer. He knows her license is suspended. This is why tazors are now standard issue.

item.title: Episode 003
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: ROBBER KNOCKS HIMSELF OUT ON CAMERA
item.itunes:summary: An amazing armed robbery caught on tape ends when a robber gets knocked out... he jumps off the counter onto a shopping cart and gets knocked the f*ck out.
item.description: An amazing armed robbery caught on tape ends when a robber gets knocked out... he jumps off the counter onto a shopping cart and gets knocked the f*ck out.

item.title: Episode 002
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: BUS PASSENGER PUNCHED IN FACE
item.itunes:summary: A guy comes on the bus and asks somebody for change... when he says NO, he gets his ticket punched.
item.description: A guy comes on the bus and asks somebody for change... when he says NO, he gets his ticket punched.

item.title: Episode 001
item.itunes:author: RC Raycraft
item.itunes:subtitle: CASHIER STRIKES BACK ATTACK
item.itunes:summary: When a crackhead robs a cashier he gives up the cash... but when he comes back, the cashier is ready and waiting for him.
item.description: When a crackhead robs a cashier he gives up the cash... but when he comes back, the cashier is ready and waiting for him.
